content: S2.5: Implement drift_liq_map.py - gPA scanner with oracle-based liquidation estimates
S2.6: Create GET /api/history/oi endpoint - OI history from Bybit worker
S2.7: Create GET /api/history/liqs endpoint - liquidation heatmap data
S2.8: Build TelemetryCards.jsx - Spread, Depth, Funding APR, Basis, OI cards
S2.9: Build OIChart.jsx - Area chart with Recharts
S2.10: Build LiqHeatmap.jsx - D3.js price bucket heatmap
S2.11: Wire telemetry components to App.js and test end-to-end
